name: Nourish Cru00e8me Riche with Vitamin C and Centella
about: What it is:u00a0A luxe cream with potent actives including vitamin C and centella clinically shown to intensely nourish, address dryness, and visibly soften fine lines...Skin Type: Normal or Dry..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Redness..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:- Triphala: A potent vitamin C that visibly brightens, protects, smooths, and supports..- Gotu Kola/Centella: Supports the production of collagen and visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles..- Coconut Oil: A delicately added, nutrient-rich, and intensely hydrating oil that makes skin glow...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Sahajan scoured the ancient Indian texts to discover the Ayurvedic elixir for vibrant, toned-, ageless-looking skin and crafted it into this blend. With potent Ayurvedic ingredients, this formula addresses dryness, related redness, supports the lipid barrier, and delivers visibly firmer, brighter skin...Clinical Results: In a 28 and 42-day clinical study of 35 women ages 35 to 60 using the cream twice daily:.- 97% experienced improvements in fine lines and wrinkles after 4 weeks.- 100% experienced improvement in skin's hydration.- 91% said the cream gave them healthier-looking skin..CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Triphala: A potent vitamin C that visibly brightens, protects, smooths, and supports..-Gotu Kola/Centella: Supports the production of collagen and visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles..-Coconut Oil: A delicately added, nutrient-rich, and intensely hydrating oil that makes skin glow....Water/Eau/Aqua, Glycerin, Centella Asiatica Extract, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Camellia Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Garcinia Indica Seed Butter, Candelilla/Jojoba/Rice Bran Polyglyceryl-3 Esters, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Cetyl alcohol, Aloe barbadensis leaf juice, Terminalia bellerica fruit extract, Terminalia Chebula Extract, Emblica Officinalis Fruit Extract, Dehydroacetic acid, Benzyl alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Fragrance (Parfum), Tocopheryl acetate....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply morning and night as part of your skincare ritual..-Massage onto face, neck, and du00e9colletage..-For best results, use after your Sahajan Radiance Serum (sold separately)...Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse the jar and recycle..-Rinse the cap and disc if needed..-Drop off at your nearest Pact bin or discard as waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin gets quite dry in the winter and this cream has been saving my skin this season. I apply it in the evening and by the morning my skin feels so nourished and hydrated. I really enjoy using the Sahajan Radiance Serum and then layering this Cream over top to help lock in moisture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect, thick, rich face cream for my dry skin. My absorbs into my skin well, and my skin looks bright and feels nourished. It locks in moisture and I especially love using this product at night as the last step in my routine!

reviews.review_title: Donu2019t get the hype - break the skin
reviews.review_text: Skin type : mix/ colour: brown skin. It made my skin break like crazy. I didnu2019t like clayish the texture either. It doesnu2019t feel like a moisturizer at all. I have use cheaper and more expensive products and never got this reaction. I used it with product that have great effect together and to remove some hyperpigmentation. It created the oppositeu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream pampers my skin so well, i dont need a lot to really apply on my skin. With just two weeks of use, it starts to even my skin. What I like most is that when I wake up in the morning, my skin is glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the texture of this cream. It is very hydrating without making me feel sticky or oily. It is perfect for when my skin gets dry in the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nourishing without being heavy. Skin feels hydrated and plump, fine lines melt away. I used it in the evening and woke up with fresh looking, bright skin in our dry Canadian winter. Normally, I have hard time keeping up with hydration needs of my skin in winter, but now I feel like I'm in good hands. Currently, I pair it up with Sahajan serum. Also thinking of using the Sahajan serum in the morning and this creme riche at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just started using this products but already I am in love. It absorbs into my skin whereas other brands I i feel are just on my face. My skin feels soft and nourished just like the products says! I even found that it evened out my skin tone which was a nice surprise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is really sensitive so itu2019s always hard for me to find a cream thatu2019s not too heavy or clogs my pores. This definitely isnu2019t that. I was surprised that despite being a thinker cream, it didnu2019t feel heavy on my skin. My skin has never looked better and is surprisingly hydrated as the weather transitions to colder months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. Itu2019s not too heavy or oily. Leaves your face with a natural glow. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't feel too thick or sit on the skin weirdly, it sinks in and nourishes the skin nicely.

Ma peau est extru00eamement su00e8che du au changement de tempu00e9rature cu2019est encore pire mais avec cette cru00e8me wow ! Ju2019ai vu une grande diffu00e9rence apru00e8s seulement une utilisation
I like this product! I feel like it's sinking into my skin. It is not greasy which I like. Fills velvety

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is nourishing without being oily. It absorbs very quickly and smells fantastic! It's great to use before makeup application and I especially like to use it in the spring/summer/fall when my skin is more oily and needs a less oily cream. It smooths my skin and reduces redness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product recently and impressed with the results. As the colder, dryer winter weather approaches Iu2019ve been finding this product soothing to the skin. Truly giving the moisture I need while brightening my skin. I would recommend this to annoying looking for a good quality moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great hydrating cream that blends skin tone, reduces rediness and enriches.  I use it after allowing the serum to absorb a bit.  Leaves a smooth, soft and even complexion that lasts all day.  Would prefer unscented but nonetheless I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absorbs quickly and smells like an expensive spa. I am also using it on the back of my hands and neck. The packaging looks great and feels luxe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nourishing and great for anti-aging. I have been using this product for a long time and am finally glad to see it at Sephora.  So good if your skin in dry and you have some redness. It makes a big difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cream. It's deeply nourishing and I can see a meaningful difference in my dryness, the fine lines and the redness on my face.  Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this product but was very disappointed. Aside from the product itself, the jar was 1/3 empty which is not ok after paying this much for the item. The cream left this weird dry feeling after applying, like I had put on some sort of mattifier. It wasn't hydrating at all and my usually glowing, dewy skin looked dull and felt rough, not soft and smooth. Lastly, I did not like the smell so I wouldn't have worn during the day even if I liked the actual cream. I will be returning the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving the feel of this product on my skin! After the first use, my skin immediately felt so moisturized and smooth! I canu2019t wait to try other products from this line!

reviews.review_title: this is GOLD- my skin is so happy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw happier skin in 1 use, I use it on slightly damp cleansed face and it just melts in!

reviews.review_title: A new winner for my night time routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Sahajan Nourish Cru00e8me riche for about a week now, it has a very natural spa mud like scent. Beautiful packaging. The texture of the cru00e8me is a little thick for the day time for me if I plan to wear any makeup but I love my new routine of using this as a nighttime cream. It feels so nourishing on my skin, applies really nicely to the skin, very moisturizing and doesnu2019t feel cakey or too heavy. I love how my face feels in the AM and overall feel like skin tone has been nicer and skin feels plump and smooth. Iu2019m sold on this product and I am excited to try some of the other products within this skincare line   Thanks,  Val Foster

reviews.review_title: Finally help for my thirsty skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a smaller version of this in the Discovery Kit and LOVE it!   Easy apply, light scent and I wake up with nourished skin! I loved the smaller size of this product so I could use while camping! I look forward to adding the full size to my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely, light scent. Easy application and absorbs nicely. Very nourishing and would be great for harsh Canadian winters but is light weight enough for humid summers. Beautiful packaging makes this product feel extra special. Appreciate that this a women led, Canadian company.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This line was highly recommended by a friend of mine. I was excited to try it as it is woman owned as well as Canadian. I have now been using it for 2 weeks and honestly I love it. I find that it leaves my skin feeling so hydrated. I especially love it at night with my retinol product as I wake up with such fresh looking skin. I have been looking for a long time for the perfect moisturizer and I do feel like this is it for me. I also have sensitive skin but it did not make me breakout. I am also using it combined with the Sahajan brightening cream, and have even received compliments on how good my skin is looking. I will be buying this cream again for sure and am tempted to try more products from this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Sahajan cru00e8me riche is absolutely fantastic for my really dry and sensitive skin. It keeps my skin hydrated all day, and feels silky smooth. I really love it!! A+!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cream for over 5 years and it never disappoints.  It is so nourishing!  It goes on smooth, absorbs quickly and leaves your skin looking and feeling amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like how thick and rich this cream is! I use it after serums and I not only feel incredibly hydrated (and notice my skin is brighter) but also feel like my skin is being protected. Great creme if you like thick textures.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this feels amazing on the skin but caused major breakouts for me.  I've stopped using it and now my skin has cleared up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This creme is thick, rich and super hydrating for my combination skin. Iu2019m acne-prone, but no breakouts since using my Sahajan products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a luxurious cream that actually moisturizes my skin throughout the night. As a new mom, this feels like the ultimate self-care treat. I am obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has been great to use on dry, sensitive skin. It did not cause any breakouts and is very hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream. It's so nourishing, and I notice a difference in my skin after just a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am disappointed with texture of the cream , expected more bc of its advertising was so attractive, itu2019s like clay no scent and hard to lather it on skin . I will return it !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Too thick ! It also gave me acne which I never get . It should  be a mask thatu2019s how thick it was .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product - my skin has been a bit on the red side lately and within one week of using this product I noticed less inflammation and better hydration.

reviews.review_title: Love this as part of my night time routine
reviews.review_text: I'm a huge fan of this product as part of my night time routine. I love that it's rich and creamy, but doesn't leave my skin feeling heavy or oily at night. I also love the earthy scent - I never want anything fragrant or artificial on my skin, especially at bed time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the night  ream i swear by and is hands down more effective than any other I've used so far - and far less expensive!! It's buttery and rich and full of clean ingredients that i feel good about using every day.  I also have very sensitive skin and i find the creme extremely nourishing and restorative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily, sensitive, acne-prone skin and this did not sink into my skin at all. I found it far too heavy for my face and I broke out within the first few days of use. Iu2019m also not too keen on the scent. I found it lingered in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favourite Sahajan product - which is hard to choose because they are all so great. This creme goes on very nicely - it's smooth, hydrating and moisturizing. It feels luxurious and sinks in well on my skin. I was worried it would feel heavy but it's not at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this product for over 7 years and Iu2019m SO happy Sephora is finally carrying them! Lisa and her brand are a godsend, my eczema prone skin canu2019t get enough of Sahajan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream feels so luxurious! It's super hydrating and did not bother my sensitive skin at all. It leaves my skin looking bright and refreshed. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: This is my new favourite product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nourish Cru00e8me Riche with Vitamin C and Centella is a game-changer in skincare. This rich cream delivers a potent blend of Vitamin C and Centella, leaving the skin deeply nourished and visibly revitalized. The Vitamin C brightens and evens out the complexion, while Centella works wonders in soothing and rejuvenating the skin. The texture is luxurious yet non-greasy, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive ones. After incorporating this into my routine, I noticed a significant improvement in the overall appearance and texture of my skin. I have oily skin and by mid-day I notice my face feeling greasy. While using this product my skin feels great all day long. Don't be worried about it's brown  colouring it blends right into your skin.   If you're looking for a powerhouse moisturizer that delivers radiant results, look no further.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using  this moisturizer for the past month in my opinion it is very brighting and very rich in feeling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the nicest moisturizer I have ever used. It goes on really smoothly, smells fresh but not perfumed and leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated. Mixes well with other Sahajan products like the skin oil and the serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first glance I was worried this product would feel too heavy. It wasnu2019t. It applied evenly and I felt like it filled fine lines and moisturized just enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this fabulous cream for over 5 years and my skin has benefited tremendously. My fine lines are at a minimum, my skin glows and looks healthy! I recommend this face cream to all my friends and family because it nourishes the skin so amazingly well!.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is luxurious and thick but leaves the skin feeling weightless and hydrated.  Beautiful texture, very soothing.  Paired with the cleansing milk my skin felt amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing! It is rich but not greasy and feels luxurious when you apply it.  In the summer I only wear this cream and no foundationu2026.I feel I donu2019t need anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not one to write reviews but this cream is amazing! Iu2019m in my mid 20s south Asian, have a slight hyperpigmentation and it really made it so much lighter. Iu2019ve been using it since December 2023. Makes a huge difference Iu2019m sure if I continue to use it my hyperpigmentation  will be completely gone! The only thing is that it is a bit drying so I would use it with the glow serum and tonerdifference.

This cream transformed my skin! Itu2019s incredibly rich and hydrating, and feels luxurious when you apply it. itu2019s moisturized my skin and I find myself having a brighter complexion after a few weeks of using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over the past few weeks, I am loving the results! It has helped keep my dry skin feeling hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect moisturizer for combo/dry skin. Non-irritating and melts right into my skin. I use it after using the Sahajan serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have quite sensitive skin and this product has done wonders for it! My skin didnu2019t react and felt hydrated. When applying the cream, my skin absorbed it quite quickly and it didnu2019t have an oily feel to it, which I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this product and canu2019t stop talking about it to friends and family. It leaves my skin feeling soft and bright, a must try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product seriously works wonders on dryness and redness, while evening out my skin tone. My skin is brighter, tighter and glowing to the gods!!

Sometimes I cant help but notice the fine lines on my forehead when I look in the mirror. After using the Nourish Cream for a while, I have noticed drastic improvements in reducing the lines and my skin looks healthier overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my mom and she loves it! Great texture and leaves skin feeling extremely rejuvenated. Noticed wrinkle-blurring effects, this product is a staple for women looking to reduce fine lines.

reviews.review_title: More than a touch of elegance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My face has always been prone to dryness and flakiness, and the Sahajan trio of the Radiance Face Serum, Nourish Cru00e8me Riche, and their face oil have provided such a huge boost to my skin health. I love the ritual of applying these, knowing they're packed with what my skin is longing for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fabulous moisturizer that lasts all day long, even in winter! Some days as a treatment I'll add a drop or two of Sahajan's Beauty Oil to it, but it performs so well on its own. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this cream does exactly what the name says, it nourishes my skin! Iu2019ve noticed a significant difference in my skin's hydration levels since I started incorporating it into my routine. I wake up to skin that feels plump, hydrated & supple, without any greasy residue. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a night moisturizer that provides intense hydration without weighing down the skin. It's a game-changer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with oily/dry combination skin, this product was perfect for me! It's moisturizing and brightening, and does not feel sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The richness of this cream is unmatched. It is not greasy at all and when I put it on at night, my face is still soft and hydrated in the morning. It is unlike any other riche cream I have used in the past, it locks in moisture and definitely helps minimize fine lines. I highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful moisturizer for my dry skin.  It leaves it feeling soft and nourished.  The smell is not my favourite or I would give it 5 stars.  It works really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy, rich and nourishing, this cream is perfect for those that need more hydration in dry climates. A must buy for winter months, for brightening and hydrating dull skin. Amazing quality of ingredients, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loving this nourishing cream! Its been a gamechanger for my skin, leaving it incredibly soft and hydrated!  Definitely a must have in my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just started using this product and so far it is lovely! The packaging, the smell, and appearance is luxurious. Very hydrating for dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this Cru00e8me for a few years now. Smells amazing and leaves my face looking brighter and glowing. Bonus that this is a Toronto based company run by a female entrepreneur .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has changed my skin routine, for the better! Itu2019s brought me back to a happy place. My skin is bright and dewy, without being oily. A just buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream has become a part of my daily ritual.  The luxe formula is an absolute treat and something that I look forward to every day. I used to have dry patches on my skin, but now my skin feels evenly hydrated and glowing!!

reviews.review_title: Quickly became a staple in my daily routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This facial cru00e8me quickly became by go-to product, both morning and night! Smooth texture and left my skin feeling refreshed / rehydrated. Run (donu2019t walk) to add this product to your daily routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Sahajan for a couple of years now and my skin has never been better!  After moving to the west of Canada, in a drier climate than where I lived prior, I looked for a new skincare line to accomodate this new climate.  Amazing products!  All of them!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this cream for a few months now and itu2019s so hydrating for my dry skin. I love the texture and how it feels on my skin. Canu2019t wait to try more of these products!

reviews.review_title: My skin savior during Winter months
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're like me and suffer with dry scaly skin during Winter, this is an absolute dream. It feels creamy, thick and nourishing on the skin and helps bring my face back to plump and healthy hydration. It's definitely my staple when the cold snap hits in November every year.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Deeply moisturizing!!! It's rich, nourishing makes my skin glow. I totally recommend it !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This face cream lives up to its name.  Nourishing!  With this cream being so rich, you don't need a lot.  I would recommend to just dab small amounts to key areas for example, forehead, face and neck.  As the saying goes less is more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing daily moisturizer - my skin feels amazing after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the texture of the product and was excited by the quality of the ingredients used; however, it wasn't a good match for my skin type. Although it felt moisturizing and hydrating, I didn't like the way it sat on my skin afterward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing! I can't recommend it enough. Whether you're looking to brighten dull skin, reduce the signs of aging, or simply add a boost of hydration to your routine, this cream has you covered. Use it on your face and neck. Trust me, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rich and hydrating cream without being thick or heavy.
I love this cream so much. Noticed a big difference after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this after washing my face right before I leave my house and let me tell you - the way it leaves my skin feeling refreshed and hydrated is next to none! If you struggle with dryness and feeling like your skin is just not as supple as it should, especially in dry or humid climates, give this a go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found the colour of the moisturizer a little daunting at first but upon application it blends and settles into my skin surprisingly well with no issues. Very nice and hydrating moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive skin that's prone to redness and breakouts so I'm very particular about the products I can use. This moisturizer is super super creamy and yet feels weightless when it's on. It also feels moisturizing without being greasy at all. I use it as the last step at night, after applying serums.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved this product. It felt very natural and suited my skin well. It was nourishing and moisturising! Would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've always struggled in finding a moisturizer that keeps me feeling hydrated all day, before this nourish creme, I'd have to reapply many times throughout the day with every other moisturizer I tried. The Nourish Creme not only smells amazing but keeps me feeling fresh all day long.
Great product to use after a workout in the pool -  really hydrates and does not make me feel sticky.   Would recommend for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this at night and love it!!! It is sooo rich and has really helped hydrate my dry skin. You only need a small amount so this will last me a long time!

reviews.review_text: This is the best face cream I have ever used.  It leaves my dry skin feeling fully hydrated and soft.  A bonus that it is made with all natural ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a male who typically doesn't use skincare products, trying out this ayurvedic face cream was a new experience for me.  I gotta admit, it felt pretty indulgent u2013 rich and nourishing and I really only used a dab.  What surprised me the most was the instant improvement in my skin's appearance. It seemed to smooth out imperfections and gave my complexion a healthier glow. I was almost tempted to pile on more, thinking it would enhance the effect, but as I've been told with skincare a little goes a long way. Overall, despite being new to taking care of my face, I was impressed with this product. My after-shave now feels like I'm just applying filler - so I'd say this is product is definitely worth considering for anyone seeking to up their skincare game, regardless of gender.

reviews.review_text: Sahajan is now at Sephora-- yayyyy!!  Sahajan Creme feeds and heals my over 40s skin through our harsh, dry canadian winter with bright, hydrated results. A little goes a long way, and with Vit C!!

I was looking for a luxurious feeling but hard working cream that included some firming ingredients - amazing feel on the skin and I was able to  see (and feel the results) within the first week of including in my routine.  I switched to Sahajan as I was looking for a clean moisturizer that I could use over and over again without worry about chemicals.

I can not say enough about this amazing product!

reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite face cream for year round - nourishing for winter but doesn't feel too heavy for warmer weather. Sometimes I will use only at night in the summer if I am wearing spf etc in the day - but I love this cream. And it smells SO lovely.

reviews.review_title: Used it to the last drop- the best
reviews.review_text: It doesnu2019t get better than this cream. I have used this to the last drop. My skin is dry, red and sensitive and after one use I felt like it was soothing my skin. My fine lines have reduced and I feel like my skin tone is better. My skin looks amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

After using Sahajan cream daily, my skin feels hydrated and naturally most.  I continue to share this with friends, family and especially my mom.  Thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Sahajan for over 2 years now and love all their products! I am 55 years old and my skin is so hydrated and radiant. There is nothing more luxurious than the Nourish cream - I suffer from extremely dry skin and this product keeps me hydrated all day without reapplication! Love Sahajan!
